text: The following is a list of Prime ministers of Cape Verde, since the establishment of the office of Prime Minister in 1975. ==List of officeholders== Portrait Name Elected Term of office Political party Took office Left office Time in office 1 Pedro Pires 1975 1980 1985 8 July 1975 4 April 1991 PAIGC Pedro Pires 1975 1980 1985 8 July 1975 4 April 1991 PAICV 2 Carlos Veiga 1991 1995 4 April 1991 29 July 2000 MpD 3 Gualberto do Rosário — 29 July 2000 1 February 2001 MpD 4 José Maria Neves 2001 2006 2011 1 February 2001 22 April 2016 PAICV 5 Ulisses Correia e Silva 2016 22 April 2016 2021 MpD ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * World Statesmen – Cape Verde
title: List of prime ministers of Cape Verde
